name: PlayerInventory
description: The `PlayerInventory` class provides comprehensive functionality for interacting with the player's survival inventory screen in Minecraft. This includes accessing the main inventory, hotbar, armor slots, offhand, crafting grid, and recipe book functionality. It extends the `RecipeInventory` class and inherits all standard inventory operations while adding player-specific inventory management features.
overview:
This class is automatically created when you open your inventory screen (typically with 'E' key) and can be accessed through `Player.getInventory()` or `Inventory.create()` when the survival inventory is open.

The `PlayerInventory` class manages the following inventory sections:

- **Hotbar**: Slots 0-8 (9 slots) - Bottom row for quick access
- **Main Inventory**: Slots 9-35 (27 slots) - Main storage area
- **Armor**: Slots 5-8 (4 slots) - Helmet, chestplate, leggings, boots
- **Offhand**: Slot 45 - Shield or other offhand item
- **Crafting Grid**: Slots 1-4 (2x2) - Personal crafting area
- **Crafting Output**: Slot 0 - Result of crafting
- **Crafting Book**: Recipe book interface

constructors.description: Creates a new `PlayerInventory` instance for the player inventory screen.

parameters.name: inventory
parameters.description: The player inventory screen handler

methods.name: getHelmet
methods.description: Gets the item in the player's helmet (armor) slot.

methods.name: getChestplate
methods.description: Gets the item in the player's chestplate (armor) slot.

methods.name: getLeggings
methods.description: Gets the item in the player's leggings (armor) slot.

methods.name: getBoots
methods.description: Gets the item in the player's boots (armor) slot.

methods.name: getOffhand
methods.description: Gets the item in the player's offhand slot.

methods.name: isInHotbar
methods.description: Checks if a given slot index is part of the player's hotbar.

parameters.name: slotIndex
parameters.description: The index of the slot.

methods.name: getInput
methods.description: Gets the item stack in the crafting grid at the specified (x, y) coordinates. (2x2 grid for player inventory)

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The X coordinate in the 2x2 crafting grid (0 or 1).

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The Y coordinate in the 2x2 crafting grid (0 or 1).

methods.name: getOutput
methods.description: Gets the item stack in the crafting output slot.

methods.name: getInput
methods.description: Gets the entire 2x2 crafting grid as a 2D array of item stacks.

methods.name: getCraftingWidth
methods.description: Returns the width of the crafting grid (2 for player inventory).

methods.name: getCraftingHeight
methods.description: Returns the height of the crafting grid (2 for player inventory).

methods.name: getCraftingSlotCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of input slots in the crafting grid (4 for player inventory).

methods.name: getInputSize
methods.description: Returns the total number of input slots in the crafting grid (4 for player inventory). Alias for getCraftingSlotCount().

methods.name: getCategory
methods.description: Gets the category of recipes currently displayed in the recipe book. Inherited from RecipeInventory.

methods.name: getCraftableRecipes
methods.description: Returns a list of `RecipeHelper` objects for recipes that can currently be crafted with items in the inventory.

methods.name: getRecipes
methods.description: Returns a list of all known recipes, optionally filtered to only show craftable ones. Inherited from RecipeInventory.

parameters.name: craftable
parameters.description: If true, only returns recipes that can be crafted with current inventory items.

methods.name: isRecipeBookOpened
methods.description: Checks if the recipe book is currently open within the inventory screen.

methods.name: toggleRecipeBook
methods.description: Toggles the visibility of the recipe book.

methods.name: setRecipeBook
methods.description: Sets the visibility of the recipe book.

parameters.name: open
parameters.description: True to open the recipe book, false to close it.

methods.name: is
methods.description: Checks if the inventory is of a specific type (e.g., 'Survival Inventory'). Inherited from Inventory.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type string to check against.

methods.name: getType
methods.description: Returns the string identifier for the inventory's type. Inherited from Inventory.

methods.name: getTotalSlots
methods.description: Returns the total number of slots in the inventory, including player inventory slots, armor, and offhand. Inherited from Inventory.

methods.name: getMap
methods.description: Returns a map detailing the slot indices for different sections of the inventory (e.g., 'hotbar', 'main', 'armor'). Inherited from Inventory.

methods.name: getContainerTitle
methods.description: Returns the localized title of the inventory container (e.g., 'Inventory'). Inherited from Inventory.

methods.name: getSlot
methods.description: Retrieves the `ItemStackHelper` for a specific slot by its global index. Inherited from Inventory.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The global index of the slot.

methods.name: getSlots
methods.description: Returns an array of global slot indices belonging to the specified inventory sections. Inherited from Inventory.

parameters.name: sections
parameters.description: One or more inventory section names (e.g., 'main', 'hotbar', 'helmet').

methods.name: getLocation
methods.description: Returns the descriptive location string for a given slot index (e.g., 'hotbar', 'main', 'helmet'). Inherited from Inventory.

parameters.name: slotIndex
parameters.description: The global index of the slot.

methods.name: findFreeHotbarSlot
methods.description: Finds and returns the global index of the first empty slot in the player's hotbar. Returns -1 if no free slot. Inherited from Inventory.

methods.name: findFreeInventorySlot
methods.description: Finds and returns the global index of the first empty slot in the main inventory area. Returns -1 if no free slot. Inherited from Inventory.

methods.name: findFreeSlot
methods.description: Finds and returns the global index of the first empty slot in the specified inventory section. Returns -1 if no free slot. Inherited from Inventory.

parameters.name: section
parameters.description: The name of the inventory section (e.g., 'main', 'hotbar').

methods.name: contains
methods.description: Checks if the inventory contains an item matching the given ID or `ItemStackHelper`. Inherited from Inventory.

parameters.name: itemIdentifier
parameters.description: The item ID (e.g., 'minecraft:diamond') or an `ItemStackHelper` to search for.

methods.name: findItem
methods.description: Finds all slots containing an item matching the given item ID. Inherited from Inventory.

parameters.name: itemIdentifier
parameters.description: The item ID to search for (e.g., 'minecraft:diamond').

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns a map of item IDs to their total counts across the entire inventory. Inherited from Inventory.

methods.name: getItems
methods.description: Returns an array of unique `ItemStackHelper` objects representing items found in the specified inventory sections. Inherited from Inventory.

parameters.name: sections
parameters.description: One or more inventory section names.

methods.name: click
methods.description: Simulates a click on a specified slot. `mouseButton` 0 for left-click, 1 for right-click. Inherited from Inventory.

parameters.name: slotIndex
parameters.description: The global index of the slot to click.

parameters.name: mouseButton
parameters.description: The mouse button to use (0: left, 1: right). Defaults to 0.

methods.name: quick
methods.description: Performs a 'quick move' (shift-click) operation on a slot, moving the item between inventory sections. Inherited from Inventory.

parameters.name: slotIndex
parameters.description: The global index of the slot to quick-move.

methods.name: dropSlot
methods.description: Drops the item from the specified slot. If `dropStack` is true, drops the entire stack. Inherited from Inventory.

parameters.name: slotIndex
parameters.description: The global index of the slot to drop from.

parameters.name: dropStack
parameters.description: If true, drops the entire stack; otherwise, drops one item. Defaults to false.

methods.name: swapHotbar
methods.description: Swaps the item in `fromSlot` with the item in the specified hotbar slot index (0-8). Inherited from Inventory.

parameters.name: fromSlot
parameters.description: The global index of the slot to swap from.

parameters.name: hotbarIndex
parameters.description: The target hotbar index (0-8).

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits an item stack from `fromSlot` and moves half of it to `toSlot`. Inherited from Inventory.

parameters.name: fromSlot
parameters.description: The source slot index.

parameters.name: toSlot
parameters.description: The target slot index (must be empty or contain the same item).

methods.name: grabAll
methods.description: Collects all matching items in the inventory into the stack on the cursor, or if the cursor is empty, picks up all matching items into the cursor. Inherited from Inventory.

parameters.name: slotIndex
parameters.description: The slot index whose item type should be grabbed.

methods.name: dragClick
methods.description: Performs a drag-click operation across multiple slots, distributing the held item. `mouseButton` 0 for left-click drag, 1 for right-click drag. Inherited from Inventory.

parameters.name: slots
parameters.description: An array of global slot indices to drag across.

parameters.name: mouseButton
parameters.description: The mouse button to use (0: left, 1: right).

methods.name: getSelectedHotbarSlotIndex
methods.description: Returns the index (0-8) of the currently selected hotbar slot. Inherited from Inventory.

methods.name: setSelectedHotbarSlotIndex
methods.description: Sets the currently selected hotbar slot to the given index (0-8). Inherited from Inventory.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The target hotbar index (0-8).

methods.name: getSlotUnderMouse
methods.description: Returns the global index of the slot currently under the mouse cursor, or -1 if none. Inherited from Inventory.

methods.name: getHeld
methods.description: Returns the `ItemStackHelper` for the item currently being held by the mouse cursor. Inherited from Inventory.
